attributes.action: Tax the sale of all goods on Ebay by anyone who sells more than 10 items per year!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are far too many people operating a business behind an email adress and PO Box Number. 
These businesses are a threat to genuine retailers.
Taxing Ebay sales will allow genuine businesses to claim back the Tax.
Private individuals who sell less than 10 items a years should be exempt from TAX
